items.name: Alchemist Stardust
items.description:
An ethereal substance harvested from the exits of black holes. 
This spinozian object shimmers with the memory of ancient stars and forgotten constants.
items.effects: Used in transdimensional crafting. Resonates with 5D equations.
items.credits: Collected by DeepCore Alchemy Arrays during stellar decay events. Data courtesy of KBVE AstroQuant and illustrations by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Anime Body Pillow
items.description:
A full-length comfort pillow featuring a vaguely familiar animated figure.
One side smiles. The other... doesn't.
items.effects: Restores morale. Reduces loneliness debuff. May alter dreams.
items.credits: Art & Printed by KBVE Pixel Workshop under assumed identity.

items.name: Auto Cooker 9000
items.description: An intelligent cooking device capable of preparing meals from raw code, DNA, or grocery leftovers. It hums with culinary ambition.
items.effects: Can be deployed to automate cooking, enhance food quality, and reveal hidden recipe traits.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Beer
items.description:
A frothy, golden beverage brewed from hops, grain, and patience. 
Grants mild strength, courage, and unfortunate honesty.
items.effects: Boosts morale, slightly improves strength, lowers charisma temporarily.
items.credits: Pixel art crafted by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Blue Shark
items.description: A heavy fish that heals the consumer's health and provides mana.
items.effects: Heals 50 health and increases mana by 25 for 10 minutes.
items.credits: Shark fish asset was by Roku6 - https://roku6.itch.io/pixelfishes

items.name: Bone
items.description: A simple piece of organic matter. Alchemists value it. Dogs adore it. Spirits… tolerate it.
items.effects: Used in alchemy or pet enrichment. May occasionally harbor residual spirit echoes.
items.credits: Lore by h0lybyte and Asset by CraftPix (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-undead-loot-pixel-art-icons).

items.name: Brown Curry Sauce
items.description:
A savory, aromatic sauce made from a mysterious brown roux, aged spices, and memory-triggering heat.
Often paired with rice, dreams, or cold mornings.
items.effects: Restores stamina and focus. May trigger nostalgic hallucinations.
items.credits: Artwork by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Butter
items.description: "A smooth, golden block of churned dairy. Adds flavor, enhances potions, and is surprisingly useful in rituals requiring softness or slip."
items.effects: Enhances crafted meals. May cause mild speed boost when applied oddly.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Cheddar Cheese
items.description:
A dense wedge of aged cheddar, sharp enough to wake the senses and smooth enough to win hearts.
Crumbles perfectly.
Smells like victory.
items.effects: Restores health and stamina. Increases charm with food-based NPCs.
items.credits: Illustrated and art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Data CD
items.description:
A disc etched with quantum-layer encoding.
Looks like a Blu-ray.
Reads like a library.
Feels like infinity.
items.effects: Holds infinite digital data. Compatible with quantum and legacy disc readers.
items.credits: Engineered by PostCore Archives using polyphase crystalline layering. Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop. Handle with light gloves.

items.name: Ecto Cooler Drank Type 95
items.description: A magical ectoplasmic brew that heals wounds and restores energy.
items.effects: Heals 20 health and restores 10 energy.
items.credits: The Ecto Cooler recipe was created by AndSam and the asset was provided by CraftPix.net (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/48-free-magic-potions-pixel-art-icons).

items.name: Ed's Jelly Jam
items.description:
Jar of rich, purple jelly jam made from mysterious grapes and questionable sugar ratios.
Sweet, strange, and wildly energizing.
items.effects: Restores energy, improves sugar-tolerance, and makes you jittery.
items.credits: Originally concocted by Ed and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Fresh Milk
items.description:
A cold bottle of nutrient-rich milk.
Sourced from friendly creatures or brave robots.
items.effects: Restores minor health and improves bone-based effects.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Fish Taco
items.description:
A warm, folded miracle of fried fish, spice, and crunchy greens. 
It smells way too good to survive long in your pack.
items.effects: Restores health and boosts reflexes for a short time.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Frozen Pizza Rolls
items.description:
A bag of bite-sized molten pockets of faux-Italian fury. 
Caution: may cause tongue trauma when overheated.
items.effects: Restores health and stamina. Can be cooked for enhanced effects.
items.credits: Concept by Chip, h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Gin
items.description:
A clear, fragrant spirit infused with juniper berries and botanical madness. 
Smoother than truth and sharper than betrayal.
items.effects: Increases charm and clarity briefly, but risks hallucination or truth leaks.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Green Pasta Sauce
items.description:
A vibrant, verdant sauce made from wild herbs, synthesized basil, and mysterious nutrient gels.
Refreshing, revitalizing, and oddly photoreactive.
items.effects: Restores stamina, enhances regeneration, and improves photosensitivity.
items.credits: Pixel artwork by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Grilled Fish Burrito
items.description:
A tightly wrapped masterpiece of grilled fish, rice, beans, and smoldering spices.
Warm, heavy, and oddly inspiring.
items.effects: Restores health and grants a temporary strength/resistance buff.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Herbal Medi-Wrap
items.description:
A bandage infused with crushed herbs and natural oils.
Cools the skin, closes wounds, and smells faintly of mint and earth.
items.effects: Heals wounds over time. Reduces bleeding and restores vitality.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Ink Pasta Sauce
items.description: A jet-black sauce made from harvested squid ink, deep ocean salts, and forbidden emulsifiers. Dark, savory, and a little bit cursed.
items.effects: Enhances stealth and vision in darkness. May attract deep sea entities.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Jar of Honey
items.description:
A golden jar of concentrated sweetness. 
Restores health, soothes minds, and binds the tongue of liars.
items.effects: Heals and energizes. Used in alchemy, medicine, and mead production.
items.credits: concept by h0lybyte and Jar model by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Jared's Teddy Bear
items.description:
A ziplock bag stuffed with old newspaper and sealed with tape. 
A smiley face is drawn in marker. It crinkles when hugged.
items.effects: Boosts morale slightly. May trigger unknown emotional responses in NPCs.
items.credits: Concept from silicon valley and item art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Kiwi Jigsaw
items.description:
A taxidermy kiwi bird stitched atop a grim ceramic mask. 
Equal parts adorable and unnerving.
It watches. It judges.
items.effects: Emits a faint presence. May trigger fear or laughter depending on who is looking.
items.credits: Crafted as a cursed novelty or a misunderstood cultural fusion. Origin unknown. Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop. Warning label missing.

items.name: Krispee Air Fryer
items.description:
A countertop relic of culinary efficiency.
Infuses meals with crispiness, joy, and possibly low-level radiation.
items.effects: Cooks food faster with enhanced stats. May trigger food-based buffs.
items.credits:
Manufactured by KrispeeTech Culinary Systems before the Great Banquet Collapse of 2042.
Artwork by KBVE Pixel Workshop and Chip schematic reverse-engineered from salvaged appliances.

items.name: Kryptonite Book
items.description:
A tattered manual on the undoing of the invincible.
It reads like both scripture and strategy.
The margins are deeply unnerving.
items.effects: Provides theoretical knowledge on dismantling godlike figures.
items.credits: Authorship unknown.

items.name: Lobster Soup
items.description:
A rich and creamy soup made from deep-sea lobster, bone broth, and rare roots.
It nourishes the body and stirs forgotten tides in the mind.
items.effects: Restores large health, boosts regeneration, and grants temporary sea affinity.
items.credits: Prepared using ancestral cooking methods, this soup connects landfolk to ocean memory. Served in coastal shrines and submarine kitchens alike. Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Lobster
items.description:
A large, armored crustacean pulled from the deep.
Its meat is prized, its shell revered, and its behavior is disturbingly strategic.
items.effects: Restores a large amount of health and grants minor natural armor.
items.credits: Pixel artwork by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Microchip Motherboard
items.description: A core circuit board etched with microscopic pathways and ancient logic gates.
items.effects: Core component for robots, drones, and terminal upgrades.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Natural Beeswax
items.description:
Golden, pliable, and faintly fragrant.
Harvested from industrious bees and used in candles, salves, and alchemical seals.
items.effects: Used for crafting candles, medicine, and magical warding items.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Noodles Girthy Pharma Potion
items.description: A thick, glistening potion infused with unknown pharmaceutical enhancers. It buzzes with dubious vitality.
items.effects: Heals 15 health and provides a temporary strength boost.
items.credits: This potion was formulated by NoodlesTech Labs, using proprietary compounds. Asset provided by CraftPix.net (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/48-free-magic-potions-pixel-art-icons).

items.name: Paradox Sack of Potatoes
items.description: An ordinary sack of potatoes, except for the hum. It vibrates with an energy that predates logic and the redshift.
items.effects: Restores health and briefly disorients reality.
items.credits: The Paradox Potatoes were discovered accidentally by a rogue chef in a temporal rift. Concept was by Paradox from GDL and Asset artwork from KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Pied Piper Jacket
items.description: A vibrant coat woven from misdirection and melody. Whistles faintly when no one’s speaking. Creatures tend to follow.
items.effects: Boosts charm and minor control over low-intelligence creatures.
items.credits: Inspired from Silicon Valley with Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Pocket Prophet of Profit
items.description: A whispering idol from the subprime depths. It glows faintly with insider congressional knowledge and financial dread.
items.effects: Reveals future market trends and causes minor existential dread.
items.credits: Originally forged beneath Wall Street in 2007 Q4 by The Black Vault Syndicate. Allegedly blessed by a former CFO turned lich. Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Propagandist Laptop
items.description:
An outdated laptop brimming with influence campaigns and forgotten scripts. The fan runs louder when lies are typed.
Why does it keep saying that it runs arch? Oh god, its update is several exa-holy-bytes, are those just node modules?!
items.effects: Enables narrative injection and cyber surveillance.
items.credits: Originally distributed during the "Algorithmic Spring" by black-budget operatives. Digital archeology by KBVE SIGINT. Assets by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Portable Powerbank
items.description:
A compact energy reservoir built to survive collapse and recharge whatever still runs.
Buzzes faintly when shaken.
items.effects: Recharges devices and tools. May overheat if pushed too far.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Pixel art by KBVE Workshop.

items.name: Punk Skateboard
items.description:
This is a custom board wrapped in duct tape, spray paint, and noise. 
Built for speed, flair, and unfiltered rebellion.
items.effects: Increases movement speed. Can be used for combat tricks and distraction.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Quick Toolbelt
items.description: A compact set of precision tools designed for on-the-fly fixes. Ideal for rapid-response engineers and grease-streaked survivalists.
items.effects: Improves repair efficiency by 1%. Compatible with bots, drones, and ships.
items.credits: Designed by KBVE MicroForge Systems for maintenance in zero-G and radiation-heavy zones. Commonly issued in early planetary expeditions.

items.name: Retro CRT Monitor
items.description:
A bulky, curved-screen terminal from the golden age of glass and static.
Displays 8-bit data streams and shell interfaces with haunting clarity.
items.effects: Enables access to classic shell terminals and renders retro data feeds.
items.credits: Salvaged from forgotten broadcast towers and basement bunkers. CRT manufactured pre-Singularity by CathoTech Industries. Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Rebel Radio
items.description:
Scrappy handheld transceiver patched together with stolen parts and righteous fury.
Tuned to voices the regime can not and must not hear.
items.effects: Used to contact rebel factions, call support, or jam surveillance signals.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and inspired from Andor, with the pixel art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Rubber Tire
items.description:
A durable circular frame of vulcanized rubber.
Once part of a vehicle, now part of your future project—or a makeshift barricade.
items.effects: Used in crafting vehicles, playgrounds, traps, or bonfires.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Artwork by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Salmon
items.description: A fresh salmon, delicious and nutritious! It can be used for cooking!
items.effects: Restores 15 health over 5 seconds.
items.credits: Salmon fish asset was by Roku6 - https://roku6.itch.io/pixelfishes

items.name: Spooky Skull Candle
items.description:
A macabre light source carved from bone and wax.
Flickers when nearby spirits grow restless.
items.effects: Provides soft ambient light and detects lesser evil spirits.
items.credits: Lore by h0lybyte and Asset by CraftPix (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-undead-loot-pixel-art-icons).

items.name: Steel Beehive
items.description:
A durable apiary unit engineered for optimal wax and honey yield.
Buzzes softly even when no bees are visible.
items.effects: Generates beeswax and honey over time. Supports crafting of candles, drinks, and medicine.
items.credits:
Developed by AgriForge BioMechanics for semi-automated apiary expansion in industrial settlements.
Pixel asset by KBVE Workshop. 
Field-tested by forest monks and space ranchers alike.

items.name: Swiss Cheese
items.description:
A wedge of holey delight, aged with care and mystery.
Smells mild but lingers forever.
items.effects: Restores health and slightly improves focus. May attract unwanted attention.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Surfer Longboard
items.description:
A sleek, ocean-worn board designed for smooth cruising. 
Whether it's sand, boardwalk, or soft metal tiles, this ride flows with tidal grace.
items.effects: Boosts mobility and style. Grants temporary water affinity.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Tex-Mex Pizza
items.description: A greasy flatbread of defiance topped with beans, jalapeños, questionable meats, and destiny. Spicy. Regretful. Legendary.
items.effects: Restores health and grants a temporary speed burst.
items.credits: Concept inspired by TB , h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Texas BBQ Brisket
items.description:
A thick-cut slab of smoked brisket slathered in secret sauce.
Tender enough to cry over.
Bold enough to punch fate in the face.
items.effects: Restores major health and briefly boosts strength and morale.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Tomato Pasta Sauce
items.description: A hearty, slow-simmered sauce made with sun-ripened tomatoes, garlic, herbs, and just enough ambition to feed a village or start a rebellion.
items.effects: Restores health and used as a base for advanced cooking.
items.credits: Illustrated by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Undead Humanoid Skull
items.description:
The cranium of a fallen being, drained of soul but rich in residue.
Still warm in places it shouldn’t be.
items.effects: Used in necromantic rituals, dark crafting, or calcium-based agriculture.
items.credits: Commonly found in cursed lands or battlefield remnants. Asset by CraftPix (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-undead-loot-pixel-art-icons).

items.name: Vampire Blood Champagne
items.description:
A luxurious sparkling crimson drink brewed from fermented nightberries and a drop of ancient blood. 
The bottle fizzes with forbidden joy and primal allure.
items.effects: Restores vitality, enhances charisma, and briefly halts aging.
items.credits: Concept inspired by True Blood and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Vampire Blood Gelato
items.description: "A rich, frozen dessert crafted from distilled vampire blood, bitter nightfruit, and crowned with a candied heart. Sweetness meets sin."
items.effects: Heals moderately, boosts dark resistance, and restores mana when eaten under moonlight.
items.credits: Concept by Andsam, inspired by true blood and Pixel art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: VHS Tape
items.description:
A magnetic black rectangle filled with grainy memories and static secrets.
No label.
No mercy.
items.effects: Can be played on analog equipment. May contain lore, static, or psychological interference.
items.credits: Concept by h0lybyte and Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Vodka Sauce
items.description:
A smooth and creamy tomato sauce spiked with ethanol extract.
Comfort food with an edge, best used warm… or as improvised fuel.
items.effects: Restores health and adds a fiery buff. Can be used in advanced pasta crafting.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Vodka
items.description:
A clear, high-proof spirit distilled from fermented starch. 
Burns the throat, blurs the edges, and briefly silences the voices.
items.effects: Temporarily increases strength and pain resistance. May impair coordination.
items.credits: Art by KBVE Pixel Workshop.

items.name: Z90 MurderBot
items.description: A pocket-sized murder console with a glitched smile. Booting it unleashes unpredictable swarms—some helpful, some... not.
items.effects: Deploys randomized AI drones with unknown allegiance.
items.credits: Inspired by early pocket consoles and banned AI frameworks from before the 2031 Safety Accords. Concept by Ziggy Z90 Manufactured in defiance by KBVE BlackCell Division.
